casebody.data:
AL CANNON, SHERIFF, CHARLESTON COUNTY, SOUTH CAROLINA, Petitioner,
v.
Broderick William SEAY, Jr. No. 19-311. Supreme Court of the United States. March 30, 2020

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition *2634for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied. Justice Thomas, Justice Alito, and Justice Kavanaugh would grant the petition for writ of certiorari.
